attributes.value:
Instructions:
Preheat the Oven:

Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
Prepare the Dough:

Unroll the crescent roll dough and separate it into triangles.
Cut each triangle into three smaller triangles.
Wrap the Wieners:

Place one cocktail wiener on the wide end of each triangle.
Roll up the dough around the wiener and place it seam-side down on a baking sheet.
Add the Twist:

Brush the tops of the rolled wieners with melted butter.
Sprinkle everything bagel seasoning generously over the top.
Bake:

Bake in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until the dough is golden brown and cooked through.
Serve:

Serve warm, optionally with a side of cream cheese for dipping.
